thread.title: Restaurant365 Software to Attend Restaurant Finance & Development Conference
thread.title_full: Restaurant365 Software to Attend Restaurant Finance & Development Conference - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Restaurant365 Software to Attend Restaurant Finance & Development Conference
text:
Restaurant365 Software to Attend Restaurant Finance & Development Conference
Irvine, CA, October 22, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Restaurant365 is excited to attend and exhibit at the Restaurant Finance and Development Conference (RFDC) being held at the Wynn Hotel in Las Vegas, Nevada November 9-11. Restaurant365 will be at Booth 823 showcasing its software solutions for multi-unit restaurant companies.
The Restaurant Finance & Development Conference is the restaurant industry's "must attend" event for growth-minded restaurant company owners and executives focused on the "business" side of the restaurant business. Conference goers attend educational programs which feature practical financial, operational and development topics presented by restaurant industry experts.
Restaurant365 will be demonstrating their new system update to the software. This update includes many enhancements, including additional features, a mobile app for iOS and Android devices, and most importantly, full multi-browsers support for PC, Mac and tablet devices. It is the first and only true cloud-based, restaurant-specific accounting software to run natively on Mac OS devices.
“We are excited to attend this show and to demo the latest release of our leading web-based accounting software. The RFDC show is a huge platform for business owners to grow and change their business and we are honored to be part of this event,” states Restaurant365 VP and Co-founder Morgan Harris.
Come see how Restaurant365 can effectively cut unwanted financial waste and save time so you can focus on operating your restaurant. To schedule a demo please visit www.restaurant365software.com .
About Restaurant365:
Restaurant365 provides a software-as-a-service (SAAS) to the food service industry including accounting, above store functionality, inventory, recipes, food costing, labor, franchising and catering, within a single application, eliminating all rekeying and reconciliation efforts that other companies deal with due to multiple systems with overlapping data. Restaurant365 integrates with major point-of-sale (POS) systems, banks, payroll providers and vendors in the food service industry to further streamline internal processes. Restaurant365 boasts a rapidly growing customer base across the nation and has customers in all restaurant segments, as well as structurally diverse companies, including multi-unit independents, franchisors, franchisees, CPA firms and bookkeeping services. Please call 866-213-0183 for more information, or visit the company online at www.restaurant365software.com.
